mapper.select: select webtoon_info.webtoon_num, webtoon_info.webtoon_title, webtoon_info.webtoon_writer, webtoon_info.webtoon_content ,webtoon_info.webtoon_image from webtoon_info where webtoon_info.webtoon_num = #{webtoonNum}
select * from favorites_info where webtoon_num = #{webtoonNum} and user_email = #{userEmail}
select count(webtoon_link) from PLATFORM_TABLE where webtoon_num = #{webtoonNum}
mapper.update: update favorites_info set interest = #{interest} where webtoon_num = #{webtoonNum} and user_email = #{userEmail}
update favorites_info set FAVORITES = #{favorites} where webtoon_num = #{webtoonNum} and user_email = #{userEmail}
mapper.select: select webtoon_info.webtoon_num, webtoon_info.webtoon_title, webtoon_info.webtoon_writer, webtoon_info.webtoon_image, PLATFORM_TABLE.WEBTOON_PLATFORM_NAME from PLATFORM_TABLE,webtoon_info where PLATFORM_TABLE.WEBTOON_PLATFORM_NAME = #{platformName} and PLATFORM_TABLE.webtoon_num = webtoon_info.webtoon_num

select webtoon_info.webtoon_num, webtoon_info.webtoon_title,webtoon_info.webtoon_writer,webtoon_info.webtoon_image,GENRE_TABLE.webtoon_genre from GENRE_TABLE,webtoon_info where GENRE_TABLE.webtoon_num=webtoon_info.webtoon_num and GENRE_TABLE.webtoon_genre=#{webtoonGenre}

select DISTINCT webtoon_info.webtoon_num, webtoon_info.webtoon_title, webtoon_info.webtoon_writer, webtoon_info.webtoon_image from user_info,webtoon_info, FAVORITES_INFO,PLATFORM_TABLE where user_info.user_email = #{userEmail} and FAVORITES_INFO.favorites = 'T' and user_info.user_email=FAVORITES_INFO.user_email and FAVORITES_INFO.webtoon_num=webtoon_info.webtoon_num and webtoon_info.webtoon_num =PLATFORM_TABLE.WEBTOON_NUM and FAVORITES_INFO.webtoon_num = PLATFORM_TABLE.WEBTOON_NUM order by webtoon_info.webtoon_title

select count(webtoon_info.WEBTOON_NUM) from webtoon_info , user_info, favorites_info, PLATFORM_TABLE where user_info.USER_EMAIL = favorites_info.USER_EMAIL and favorites_info.WEBTOON_NUM = webtoon_info.WEBTOON_NUM and PLATFORM_TABLE.WEBTOON_NUM = webtoon_info.webtoon_num and favorites_info.FAVORITES ='T' and user_info.USER_EMAIL =#{userEmail} and webtoon_info.WEBTOON_NUM=#{webtoonNum}
